texts: I'm a Finnish software engineer, graduated from Metropolia University of Applied Sciences in 2019.
I've also got a tripe degree as an ICT technician which includes matriculation examination
I have a great passion to create and learn new things
At the moment I'm most interested in different Cloud infrastructures and services
I've also played guitar actively for over a decade

jobs.title: Cloud/DevOps engineer
jobs.description: AWS, DevOps, Kubernetes and Terraform development, on-premises to AWS migration

jobs.title: Full stack developer
jobs.description: Developing a large distraint system and related electronic services as a part of a SAFe scrum team, did my bachelor's thesis as a part of the

jobs.title: System specialist
jobs.description: Server maintenance, GDPR related Linux server hardening (Bash), Python automation for the error log, 3rd line customer service

jobs.title: IT support
jobs.description: Web site administration, AD configuration (Windows server), central radio system administration (Linux server), printer installations, email server administration, daycare software deployment and support (Tieto Effica), instructing two ICT trainees

jobs.title: Electronics repair
jobs.description: Computer and small electronics maintenance operation under the cooperative as a job training period, which included fixing and cleaning phones, tablets and computers

jobs.title: Cashier
jobs.description: Cashier and other customer service duties

jobs.title: IT support
jobs.description: Website creation, printer/computer installations, general IT support tasks

skills.name: Software & services
data: Most experience: AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, Java, Javascript, SQL, Python, Docker, Rook/Ceph, Lambda, Angular
Some experience: GCP, Azure, Ruby, C

skills.name: Other
data: 12 years in total of music education
10+ years of experience in playing the guitar
5+ years of experimenting and studying recording and doing other music productions

data.description: Bachelor's thesis - an integration of a personal data Web Service into a large distraint system
TaskiMatti - A routine management app for Android, made as a school project in the spring semester of 2018
Midi keyboard made with Raspberry Pi mini computer (Python)

Web site called 'Tiskijukka' (Engl. disc jockey or 'dish' jockey), where my roommate and I could see whose turn it was to do the dishes. At first I made it by using MySQL to store the timestamps and PHP to fetch the data, but we remade it as a school project using Google Firebase and Javascript.
Lego EV3 robot which scans the surrounding area with infrared and draws a map on a graphical user interface (Java)
Simple text based game made with Python
Bluetooth controlled miniature tank made with Arduino (C++)
